numeric_function.name: ceil(x)
numeric_function.usage: return the smallest value not less than x
numeric_function.sql_statement: select ceil(x) as  'Rounded Salary' from salaries limit 10 ;

numeric_function.name: floor(x)
numeric_function.usage: return the smallest value not less than x
numeric_function.sql_statement: select ceil(x) as  'Rounded Salary' from salaries limit 10 ;

string_function.name: concat_ws(string separator,string_1,string_2)
string_function.usage: concat two string with string separator
string_function.sql_statement: select concat_ws(" ",first_name,last_name) as fullname from employees limit 10 ;
string_function.join_statement: select e.emp_no as 'Employee ID' , concat_ws(" ",e.first_name,e.last_name) as 'Employee Fullname’, s.salary as 'Annual Wage' from employees e inner join salaries s on e.emp_no = s.emp_no order by s.salary desc limit 10 ;
